db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The following QML shows how to create a simple area chart:

db:note.db:para: Adding the same line series to a chart and area series is not supported. The series used as boundary lines should be defined only for the area series.

db:section.db:title: borderColor : color
db:section.db:para: Line (pen) color of the series.

db:section.db:title: borderWidth : real
db:section.db:para: The width of the border line. By default, the width is 2.0.

db:section.db:title: brushFilename : QString
db:section.db:para: The name of the file used as a brush image for the series.

db:section.db:title: color : color
db:section.db:para: Fill (brush) color of the series.

db:section.db:title: lowerSeries : LineSeries
db:section.db:para: The lower one of the two line series used to define area series boundaries.

db:note.db:para: If AreaSeries was constructed without a lowerSeries, this is null.

db:section.db:title: pointLabelsClipping : bool
db:section.db:para: Defines the clipping for data point labels. True by default. The labels on the edge of the plot area are cut when clipping is enabled.

db:section.db:title: pointLabelsColor : font
db:section.db:para: Defines the color used for data point labels. By default, the color is the color of the brush defined for labels in the theme.

db:section.db:title: pointLabelsFont : font
db:section.db:para: Defines the font used for data point labels.

db:section.db:title: pointLabelsFormat : string
db:section.db:para: The format used for showing labels with series points.

db:section.db:title: pointLabelsVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: Defines the visibility of data point labels.

db:section.db:title: upperSeries : LineSeries
db:section.db:para: The upper one of the two line series used to define area series boundaries.

db:section.db:title: clicked(point point)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user triggers a press on point by clicking it in an area chart.
The corresponding signal handler is onClicked.

db:section.db:title: doubleClicked(point point)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user triggers the first press in an area chart by doubleclicking point.
The corresponding signal handler is onDoubleClicked.

db:section.db:title: hovered(point point, bool state)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user hovers the mouse cursor over a series or moves it away from the series. point shows the origin (coordinate) of the hover event. state is true when the cursor hovers over the series and turns false when it moves away from the series.
The corresponding signal handler is onHovered.

db:section.db:title: pressed(point point)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user presses the point specified by point in an area chart.
The corresponding signal handler is onPressed.

db:section.db:title: released(point point)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user releases a press that was triggered on point in an area chart.
The corresponding signal handler is onReleased.
